title: The Kalista loading screen music is just amazing.
body: Just commenting on it.  It fits the mood of Kalista and sounds awesome!

replies.body:
And now you can listen to it on repeat for hours on end!!!!

**[Kalista](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/kalista) ** *via Soundcloud*****

https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/kalista

Gotta get that embed love in here too.
Wow, there's, like, some semblance of dynamic range.
So true! This is definitely my favourite champ theme so far. Loving the chanting chorus.

There are moments in it that remind me very strongly of "Duel of the Fates" from the *Star Wars* prequels, so I'm  going to pretend John Williams consulted on it. 
It's strange but I feel like this music does more to inform the story of the character than the actual written story. Kudos music team.
